name: Emotional Bullet Hell
description:
rainbow jam 2017, a small emotional bullet hell. didn't quite finish the aesthetics and cutscenes, and i wanted 3 levels instead of 1, but we got something done.

the first level is a platformer reminiscent of depression.

over the next week or two i will be fixing the cutscenes, fixing a bug or two, and adding a health bar, after i polish the first level i'm going to move on to another project, We learned a lot about unity and wwise during this project.
